product_name: Moxie Cycling Bolero Bike Jacket - Women's
long_description: Made of soft merino wool that naturally helps regulate your temperature, the women's Bolero Bike Jacket from Moxie will make you feel like dancing in the saddle. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Toggle adjustment ensures a snug fit and keeps drafts out. Tencel(R) lyocell cuffs have thumbholes for extra coverage and a hidden pocket on one. Moxie Bolero Bike Jacket for women keeps your arms and shoulders warm until the day heats up.
short_description: Made of soft merino wool that naturally helps regulate your temperature, the women's Bolero Bike Jacket from Moxie will make you feel like dancing in the saddle.
